item.title: A Little Fun At MobileX
item.description: A coworker and I attened MobileX in Lexington Ky this past week. It was a great time! Since we are a new smaller company we thought we should promote the company, but how? After much discussion the idea of having a simple shirt won (time/money constraints). The front had the company name while the back had a logo. It was pretty good, but we felt it needed just a bit more.
